mapper.select: select * from movie order by ratingavg desc limit #{start}, #{perPage}
mapper.insert: insert into movie(mpk, title, content, mtype,mdate,filename) values (#{mpk},#{title},#{content},#{mtype},date_format(#{mdate},'%Y-%m-%d'),#{fileupload})
mapper.update: update movie set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, mtype = #{mtype}, mdate = date_format(#{mdate},'%Y-%m-%d'), filename = #{fileupload} where mpk = #{mpk}
mapper.delete: update movie set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, mtype = #{mtype}, mdate = date_format(#{mdate},'%Y-%m-%d'), filename = #{filename} where mpk = #{mpk}
